about._Description: Information about the Podverse open source podcast app.

clips._Description: Podcast app for iOS, Android, and web. Create and share podcast highlights and playlists. Sync your queue across all devices. Open source software.

index._Title: Podverse - Create podcast highlights. Sync your podcasts across iOS, Android, and web. Open source technology.

my_profile._Description: My Podverse Profile. Subscribe to podcasts, playlists, and other profiles
